SEARCH:
程序包 org.am21.model.items

类 Hand

java.lang.Object
org.am21.model.items.Hand
public class Hand extends Object
Hand class contains an array with 3 elements. It's used to store temporarily the selected cards,during GamePhase.Selection. Min: 1 card. Max: 3 card.

      public void memCard(ItemCard item, int r, int c)
      Create a temporary Coordinates object for data setting. Then add it to the selectedItems list.
      参数:
      item - ItemCard
      r - row
      c - column
